name: openai
summary: OpenAI-compatible API client for chat completions, embeddings, and LLM interactions.
use_when: User wants to use GPT models or other LLMs
User needs to generate text, analyze content, or get AI responses
User wants to use local LLMs (Ollama, LM Studio, etc.)
User needs embeddings for semantic search or clustering
User wants to build autonomous agents with LLM reasoning
avoid_when: User wants image generation (use DALL-E API separately)
User wants audio transcription (use Whisper API separately)
User needs structured data processing without AI (use standard modules)
